detaileddescription.para: Configures all GPIO pins according to pin matrix specifications. Must be called before any other GPIO operations.

simplesect.para: GPIO_OK on success, error code on failure

briefdescription.para: Configure pin mode for specified GPIO pin.

simplesect.para: GPIO_OK on success, error code on failure
Pin numbers follow Arduino framework convention

briefdescription.para: Write digital state to output pin.

simplesect.para: GPIO_OK on success, error code on failure
Pin must be configured as output before writing

briefdescription.para: Read digital state from input pin.

simplesect.para: GPIO_OK on success, error code on failure
GPIO_OK on success, error code on failure
Pin must be configured as output
GPIO_OK on success, error code on failure

detaileddescription.para:
Sets up all 4 sonicator interfaces according to pin matrix:
Input pins: OVERLOAD, FREQ_DIV10, FREQ_LOCK
Output pins: START, RESET
